snippet: The New York Police Department has established a Grand Larceny Division, which examines patterns, like breaking into gym lockers, to identify suspects.
abstract: Michael Wilson Crime Scene column notes that New York Police Department has created Grand Larceny Division, which examines patterns and tracks repeat offenders of crimes like shoplifting and gym locker room thefts; aim is to curb what makes up 40 percent of felonies committed in the city.
lead_paragraph: The New York Police Department has established a Grand Larceny Division, which examines patterns, like breaking into gym lockers, to identify suspects.

headline.main: Detectives Are Now Calling ‘Gotcha’ Far From the Scene of the Theft
headline.print_headline: Detectives Are Now Calling ‘Gotcha’ Far From the Scene of the Theft
